Trade Supplier Benefits

Save money through membership

A directory of Suppliers who offer special deals to Members.

Find out more

Supporting Self-Catering...
Our recent study has identified that the self-catering industry in Scotland contributes £723m to the Scottish economy per annum.
  • We represent the short-term let and holiday home sector, rural or urban
  • We lobby on national, local and EU issues
  • Recognised by consultative bodies
  • Advice sought by Government
Find out more
For all owners...
Anyone who owns, or is considering buying or developing, self-catering in Scotland is welcome in the Association:
  • Owners of single properties
  • Operators making a full or second income from their holiday home(s)
  • Owners who also let through agencies
  • Operators of large self-catering complexes
Member benefits
Service, support & savings...
The Association offers a wide range of services, including this website, to owners of self-catering accommodation.  We can help you:
  • Boost your bookings
  • Market directly to thousands of extra visitors
  • Improve your business
  • Save money on rates, subscriptions and other business costs
Join ASSC today
Select Scottish Self-catering

Visit EmbraceScotland - our dedicated self-catering accommodation website for quality assured properties throughout Scotland.

  • Search quality assured properties and book direct with the owner
  • Late availability and seasonal offers
  • Find Scottish holiday inspiration
  • Discover the best of Scotland
